verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5782>Behold,<s%> I will raise up against <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and against those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3820>Lebkamai,<s%> <S%H6965><s%> a <S%H7843>destroying<s%> <S%H7307>wind.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> who shall <S%H2219>winnow<s%> <S%H1238>her;<s%> and they shall empty her <S%H776>land:<s%> for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> they shall be against her <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Against him who <S%H1869>bends<s%> let the <S%H1869>archer<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and against him who lifts himself <S%H5927>up<s%> in his <S%H5630>coat<s%> of <S%H2550>mail:<s%> and don't spare her young <S%H970>men;<s%> <S%H2763>utterly<s%> destroy all her <S%H6635>army.<s%>
They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and thrust <S%H1856>through<s%> in her <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is not <S%H488>forsaken,<s%> nor <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> though their <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H817>guilt<s%> against the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Flee <S%H5127>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H4422>save<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5315>life;<s%> <S%H1826>don't<s%> be cut off in her <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> for it is the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5360>vengeance;<s%> he will <S%H7999>render<s%> to her a <S%H1576>recompense.<s%>

<S%H894>Babylon<s%> has been a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> who made all the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7937>drunken:<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of her <S%H3196>wine;<s%> therefore the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H1984>mad.<s%>

<S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and <S%H7665>destroyed:<s%> <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H3947>her;<s%> take <S%H6875>balm<s%> for her <S%H4341>pain,<s%> if so be she may be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

We would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> but she is not <S%H7495>healed:<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3212>her,<s%> and let us go <S%H376>everyone<s%> into his own <S%H776>country;<s%> for her <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H5060>reaches<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and is lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> even to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousness:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5608>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Make <S%H1305>sharp<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows;<s%> hold <S%H4390>firm<s%> the <S%H7982>shields:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes;<s%> because his <S%H4209>purpose<s%> is against <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H5360>it:<s%> for it is the vengeance of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> against the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> make the <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H3559>set<s%> the <S%H8104>watchmen,<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H693>ambushes;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has both <S%H2161>purposed<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> that which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

You who <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H214>treasures,<s%> your <S%H7093>end<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H520>measure<s%> of your <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself,<s%> <S%H4390>saying,<s%> Surely I will fill you with <S%H120>men,<s%> as with the canker <S%H3218>worm;<s%> and they shall lift <S%H6030>up<s%> a shout against <S%H1959>you.<s%>

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he has <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> has he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%>

when he <S%H5414>utters<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and he causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>

Every <S%H120>man<s%> has become <S%H1197>brutish<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> Every <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> is <S%H3001>disappointed<s%> by his <S%H6459>image;<s%> for his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is no breath in <S%H7307>them.<s%>
They are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> a <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>delusion:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like <S%H3335>these;<s%> for he is the former of all <S%H7626>things;<s%> and is the tribe of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

You are my battle <S%H4661>axe<s%> and <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and with you will I <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>
and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider;<s%>

and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and him who <S%H7392>rides<s%> <S%H5310>therein;<s%> and with you will I break in pieces <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman;<s%> and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> man and the <S%H5288>youth;<s%> and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the young <S%H970>man<s%> and the <S%H1330>virgin;<s%>

and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> and his <S%H5739>flock;<s%> and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> the <S%H406>farmer<s%> and his <S%H6776>yoke;<s%> and with you will I break in <S%H5310>pieces<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>deputies.<s%>

I will <S%H7999>render<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and to all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> all their <S%H7451>evil<s%> that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4889>Behold,<s%> I am against you, destroying <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which <S%H7843>destroys<s%> all the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H1556>you,<s%> and roll you down from the <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

They shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> of you a <S%H68>stone<s%> for a <S%H6438>corner,<s%> nor a <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H4146>foundations;<s%> but you shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6942>prepare<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> against <S%H8085>her,<s%> call together against her the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat,<s%> <S%H4508>Minni,<s%> and <S%H813>Ashkenaz:<s%> <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H2951>marshal<s%> against <S%H5483>her;<s%> cause the horses to come <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H5569>rough<s%> canker <S%H3218>worm.<s%>

<S%H6942>Prepare<s%> against her the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> its <S%H6346>governors,<s%> and all its <S%H5461>deputies,<s%> and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7493>trembles<s%> and is in <S%H2342>pain;<s%> for the <S%H4284>purposes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon<s%> do <S%H6965>stand,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

The mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> have <S%H2308>forborne<s%> to <S%H3898>fight,<s%> they <S%H3427>remain<s%> in their <S%H4679>strongholds;<s%> their <S%H1369>might<s%> has <S%H5405>failed;<s%> they are become as <S%H802>women:<s%> her <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> places are set on <S%H3341>fire;<s%> her <S%H1280>bars<s%> are <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

One <S%H7323>runner<s%> will <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7323>another,<s%> and one <S%H5046>messenger<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5046>another,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> that his <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H3920>taken<s%> on every <S%H7097>quarter:<s%>

and the <S%H4569>passages<s%> are <S%H8610>seized,<s%> and the <S%H98>reeds<s%> they have <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> are <S%H926>frightened.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is like a <S%H1637>threshing<s%> floor at the <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> it is <S%H4592>trodden;<s%> yet a little while, and the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> shall come for <S%H935>her.<s%>

<S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H2000>me,<s%> he has crushed <S%H3322>me,<s%> he has made me an <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> he <S%H8577>has,<s%> like a monster, swallowed me <S%H1104>up,<s%> he has <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3770>maw<s%> with my <S%H5730>delicacies;<s%> he has cast me <S%H1740>out.<s%>

The <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to me and to my <S%H7607>flesh<s%> be on <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> shall the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>say;<s%> <S%H1818>and,<s%> My blood be on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H559>say.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H7378>Behold,<s%> I will plead your <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> for <S%H5360>you;<s%> and I will dry <S%H2717>up<s%> her <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and make her <S%H4726>fountain<s%> <S%H3001>dry.<s%>
<S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall become <S%H1530>heaps,<s%> a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> place for <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
They shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> like young <S%H3715>lions;<s%> they shall <S%H5286>growl<s%> as <S%H738>lions<s%>' <S%H1484>cubs.<s%>

When they are <S%H2527>heated,<s%> I will <S%H7896>make<s%> their <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and I will make them <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> that they may <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and not <S%H6974>wake,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H3733>lambs<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter,<s%> like <S%H352>rams<s%> with male <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

How is <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> <S%H3920>taken!<s%> and the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8610>seized!<s%> how is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> has come <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> she is <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of its <S%H1530>waves.<s%>

Her <S%H5892>cities<s%> are become a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>desert,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> in which no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwells,<s%> neither does any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H2004>thereby.<s%>

I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> on <S%H1078>Bel<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and I will bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that which he has swallowed <S%H1105>up;<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall not flow any more to <S%H2346>him:<s%> yes, the wall of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people,<s%> go away from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4422>her,<s%> and save <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3824>Don't<s%> let your heart <S%H7401>faint,<s%> neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> for the <S%H8052>news<s%> that shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> for <S%H8052>news<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> one <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that in another <S%H8141>year<s%> shall come <S%H8052>news,<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> against <S%H4910>ruler.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> that I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> on the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and her whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H954>confounded;<s%> and all her <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the midst of <S%H8432>her.<s%>

Then the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and all that is <S%H7442>therein,<s%> shall sing for joy over <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> for the <S%H7703>destroyers<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to her from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1571>As<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has caused the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5307>fall,<s%> so at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of all the <S%H776>land.<s%>

You who have <S%H6405>escaped<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H5975>don't<s%> stand still; <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> and let <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> into your <S%H3824>mind.<s%>

We are <S%H954>confounded,<s%> because we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> <S%H3639>confusion<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> our <S%H6440>faces:<s%> for <S%H2114>strangers<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will execute <S%H6485>judgment<s%> on her engraved <S%H6456>images;<s%> and through all her <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall <S%H602>groan.<s%>

Though <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and though she should <S%H1219>fortify<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength,<s%> <S%H227>yet<s%> from me shall <S%H7703>destroyers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5002>her,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H2201>cry<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans!<s%>

and you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus shall <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H8257>sink,<s%> and shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%> again <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H3286>her;<s%> and they shall be weary.
